name: Rara Botbuz Private Limited
description: Botbuz is an innovative chatbot and automation platform designed to revolutionize customer engagement and streamline business operations across channels like WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram. Featuring an intuitive, no-code interface, Botbuz enables businesses to automate customer interactions, generate leads, and boost sales with ease. Whether you're an e-commerce retailer, a service provider, or a rapidly expanding enterprise, Botbuz offers customized solutions that enhance communication and improve customer satisfaction. Backed by advanced technology and real-time responsiveness, Botbuz is a trusted partner for businesses worldwide, helping them strengthen their brand and achieve their goals. Additionally, we offer white-label solutions to support the growth of ambitious companies.
focus_areas: Multichannel Engagement Solutions: Integrated chatbot and automation services for WhatsApp, Facebook, and Instagram.
Broadcasting and Automation: Simplifying bulk messaging, automating notifications, and enhancing customer support with ease.
WhatsApp Business API Solutions: Delivering tailored services for enterprises & growing businesses using the powerful WhatsApp Business API.
